short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable dark mode on chrome with night mode chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Night Mode for Chrome is a free extension that changes the color of your screen to a warmer, more eye-friendly shade at night. It helps alleviate eye strain and enhances your overall browsing experience. 

How To Use? 

>> To use Night Mode for Chrome, simply install the extension  
>> To enable the Night Shift Mode, toggle the switch to the "ON" position.  


Key features 

>> Website-Specific Settings: Tailor the extension's behavior for individual websites, allowing you to apply color themes or disable Night Mode as needed.  

>> Eye Health Focus: Take care of your eyes by reducing screen brightness and minimizing eye strain while working on your computer during nighttime hours. 

 >> Alternative to Dark Mode: Night Mode for Chrome provides a practical solution for websites that don't offer a dark mode by applying warm, eye-protective colors to create a similar effect.
